values: 骨；骨头；骨骼；骨质；骨材料（如象牙或鲸骨）；基本结构；核心结构；基本框架；尸骨；尸骸；争议点
（为考试等）钻研；苦读；施骨肥于；剔去…的骨；<美俚>（男子）与…性交

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 骨的；多骨的；瘦骨嶙峋的；似骨的
骨骼的；去掉骨头的；用骨架撑起的；施过骨粉料的；去骨的

word_group.brief_definition: 与(某人)有争论/意见；对...不满
word_group.phrase: have a bone to pick with

word_group.brief_definition: 伤至骨头, 见下面；给某人带来极深影响, 深刻地
过于直率, 伤人的, 令人不舒服的；近乎下流的
额骨；构成额骨的一对骨中的任一块
肘部尺骨端；鹰嘴突；幽默感

bilingual.source: Give Spot a hug and a bone for me.
bilingual.target: 替我给斯波特一个拥抱和一根骨头。

bilingual.source: New inventions like 3D printers have been used to make replacement hearts and bone parts.
bilingual.target: 新发明如3D打印机已被用来制造替代的心脏和骨骼部件。

bilingual.source: The osteon is the fundamental unit of compact bone.
bilingual.target: 骨单位是致密骨的基本单位。

bilingual.source: The osteoclast plays a crucial role in bone resorption.
bilingual.target: 破骨细胞在骨吸收中起着至关重要的作用。

bilingual.source: Osteosarcoma is a malignant bone tumor common in teenagers.
bilingual.target: 骨肉瘤是一种常见于青少年的恶性骨肿瘤。

bilingual.source: The doctor checked his position of bone.
Do you know where the cuneiform bone is?
This X-ray shows your position of bone.
bilingual.target: 这张X光片显示了你的骨位。

bilingual.source: He injured his cuneiform bone in the accident.
bilingual.target: 他在事故中伤到了楔骨。

list.abstract: Bone，英语单词，名词、及物动词、不及物动词，作及物动词时意为“分配；拨出；使坐落于”。作不及物动词时意为“分配；指定”。
bone是一个来自台湾的创意品牌，一个坚持从生活撷取创作灵感、领略感动的创意团队。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, come on. What's that? Oh, it's an Osteo National bone-density scanner.
yingyinNormal.zh: 算了吧，那是什么? 是国骨公司生产的骨质密度扫描仪。

yingyinNormal.en: But they don't want us to have the bone, so I'm going over there to try to persuade them to give us the bone. It's a whole big bone thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但他们不想给我们骨头，因此派我去说服他们给我们骨头，都是骨头的事。

yingyinNormal.en: You're going to China? Yeah, it's for the museum. Someone found a bone, we want the bone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要去中国？对，为博物馆出差，有人找到骨头，我们要骨头。

yingyinNormal.en: Also I'm gonna apply it to the brow bone for more dimension.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要把它涂在眉骨上，看起来更有轮廓感。

yingyinNormal.en: Start with Janik Vinter. He's also known as the bone doctor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从贾尼克·文特入手，他也被叫做骨科医生。

yingyinNormal.en: You want your money. The bone doctor is going to beat it out of me. Now let Benji go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不是想拿走你的钱吗，那就让骨科医生再来拷问我，现在放班吉走。

yingyinNormal.en: When we stop, I'm gonna break every bone in your body. And drop what's left at The Hague.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等我到了我会把你身上所有的骨头都打断，把剩下的交给海牙。

yingyinNormal.en: To begin with, you will remove funny bone for two hundred dollars. For this I went to MIT.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先切除尺骨，赢得200美刀。我去麻省理工就因为这个。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, I'm gonna go say goodbye to the guys. Oh, hey, you know what? Tell them that bone story.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我去跟他们道别。告诉他们骨头的事吧。

yingyinNormal.en: You worked yourself to the bone until your bones disintegrated and were replaced by minerals and sediments.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你努力到只剩骨头，直到你的骨骼分解被矿物和沉积岩取代。

yingyinNormal.en: They say that great beasts once roamed this world. As big as mountains. Yet all that's left of them is bone and amber.
yingyinNormal.zh: 人们说庞大的野兽曾在这世间漫步，巍然如山，但现在它们只剩尸骨琥珀。

yingyinNormal.en: But the gene that regulates that down is broken. And so this informs, among other things, of course, a treatment for bone marrow transplant, which he undertakes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但这个基因的此种功能出现问题，所以对于这个问题他接受了骨髓移植的治疗。

yingyinNormal.en: And he sequenced, he took skin cells, healthy skin, and cancerous bone marrow, and he sequenced the whole genomes of both of them, right, in a couple of weeks, no big deal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他进行测序，他取了皮肤细胞，健康的皮肤，和癌化的骨髓，他测定两者的所有基因组，区区几周后。

yingyinNormal.en: I have a bone to pick with you, sir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 捉迷藏的奖品捏。

yingyinNormal.en: Blair? Serena. Hey, I got two bone-dry caps and audrey.
yingyinNormal.zh: 布莱尔？瑟琳娜。嗨，我带了两顶棒球帽和奥瑞杂志。

yingyinNormal.en: That reminds me I have a bone to pick with you. What?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这倒提醒我有笔旧账还没跟你算清。什么？

yingyinNormal.en: What? Smoked a joint, you know? Lit a bone. Weed, hemp, ganja.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？抽了一根大麻。

yingyinNormal.en: You can't even break a rule. How would you be expected to break bone?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你甚至都不敢打破规矩，又怎么敢去抛头颅洒热血?

yingyinNormal.en: I have a bone to pick with you. Uh-oh. Yes. Ben learned a little trick.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要找你麻烦。噢。对，班学了一个恶作剧。

yingyinNormal.en: And then they changed you. Made you this sad, real mess. Flesh and bone, just like us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 后来他们改变了你们，弄成这副可怜又真实的鬼样子，血肉之躯，就跟我们一样。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (have a bone to pick with)对...不满

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 与(某人)有争论(或意见)；对...不满
word_level_phrase_info.phrase: have a bone to pick with

examination_example.sentence: It is built into us in the same way that our bodies know how to heal a cut or mend a broken <highlight>bone</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是根植于我们体内的，正如我们的身体知道如何愈合伤口或是修复骨折一样。

examination_example.sentence: The French measures, however, rely too much on severe punishment to change a culture that still regards beauty as skin-deep — and <highlight>bone</highlight>-showing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，法国的措施过度依赖通过严厉惩罚来改变目前仍以外表、皮包骨为美的文化。

examination_example.sentence: Soon you'll feel comfortable asking if they've any knuckles of ham for soups and stews, or beef <highlight>bones</highlight>, chicken carcasses and fish heads for stock.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很快，你会很自在地问他们是否有可以用来炖汤或炖菜的火腿，或是用来熬高汤的牛骨、鸡肉或鱼头。

sense_info_list.zh: (have a bone to pick with)对...不满

examination_example.sentence: If you have a <highlight>bone</highlight> to pick with someone in your workplace, you may try to stay tight-lipped around them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你在职场对某人有意见，你可以在他们面前保持沉默。

word_usage.usage:
bone up on sth. 意为“学习； 复习”，如：
I must bone up on my French before we go to Paris.
我们去巴黎之前我一定得把法语捡起来。

examination_example.sentence: Doctors performed surgery and removed the <highlight>bone</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 医生们进行了手术并取出了骨头。

examination_example.sentence: She was pierced by a chicken <highlight>bone</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她(的肺部)被一根鸡骨头刺到了。

examination_example.sentence: With the <highlight>bone</highlight> finally removed from her lung, the woman is very happy that she no longer suffers from that annoying cough.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 骨头终于从她的肺中取出，这个女人很高兴，她终于不用忍受那种烦人的咳嗽了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence: After he looked for the <highlight>bone</highlight> for a short time, he lay down on the ground sadly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他找了一会儿骨头后，伤心地躺在地上。

examination_example.sentence: He was completely sure that he would find the carrot and the <highlight>bone</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他完全确定他会找到胡萝卜和骨头。

examination_example.sentence: There he found the carrot and the <highlight>bone</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在那里，他找到了胡萝卜和骨头。
